items.title: Soup of the Week

items.description: Served with our homemade marinara sauce.
items.title: Cracked Black Pepper Calamari

items.description: Ahi tuna seared rare, served on a bed of soba noodles and greens with cucumbers, tomatoes, bell peppers and carrots. Tossed in soy balsamic vinaigrette and drizzled with sweet soy.
items.title: Seared Tuna Salad

items.description: Cheddar and mozzarella cheeses on sourdough bread with your choice of rustic tomato soup or the soup of the day. Vegetarian.
items.title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich and Cup of Soup

items.description: A breaded deep fried chicken breast tossed in buffalo sauce and topped with cheddar cheese on a brioche bun. Served with choice of side.
items.title: Buffalo Chicken Sandwich

items.description: Three corn tortillas topped with breaded and fried or blackened basa, cabbage and pico de gallo. Served with refried beans, wild rice and lime aioli.
items.title: Del Mar Tacos

items.description: A 10 oz. beef flank steak with our house made Armadillo Ale steak sauce topped with stout braised onions served with cheddar mashed potatoes and seasonal veggies.
items.title: Black and Tan Steak

items.description: Fresh vegetables including tomatoes, broccoli, carrots, mushrooms and seasonal vegetables in a light white wine cream sauce over linguine. Vegetarian.
items.title: Pasta Primavera

items.description: Penne pasta with marinated tomatoes and grilled chicken in a pesto cream sauce topped with roasted red bell peppers, crushed red pepper and Parmesan cheese. Contains nuts.
items.title: Penne Pesto Cream

items.description: Gluten free fusilli pasta tossed with broccoli and shrimp in a garlic white wine sauce
items.title: Gluten Free Lemon Shrimp Fusilli Pasta

items.description: A grilled chicken breast topped with spinach, herb marinated tomatoes and mozzarella cheese on gluten free multi grain bread. Includes choice of side dish.
items.title: Gluten Free Chicken Sandwich

items.description: A homemade bread pudding with bourbon cream sauce, ice cream and a caramel drizzle
